sections.title: What is a hackathon?
sections.content: A hackathon is like a creative marathon for tech enthusiasts! DAHacks is great for first timers or returners looking to experience inspiring guest speakers, helpful workshops, tons of skilled mentors, and, of course, fun games and cool swag.

sections.title: When and where is DAHacks?
sections.content: DAHacks is from Friday, May 31st from 10:30 AM - 9 PM to Saturday, June 1st from 9 AM - 6 PM at De Anza College in the Science Center Building SC1102. This is not an overnight event.

nextSteps: Our team will review your application

If accepted, you'll need to confirm your attendance
